snippet: Now that voters in San Diego and San Jose have overwhelmingly passed pension cuts for city workers, other struggling cities may follow suit.
abstract: Residents of San Diego and San Jose vote overwhelmingly to cut the pension benefits they give city workers, including not just future hires, but also those of current workers; ease with which the measures pass is expected to embolden other financially strained cities and states to follow their lead.

byline.original: By MICHAEL COOPER and MARY WILLIAMS WALSH

lead_paragraph: Now that voters in San Diego and San Jose have overwhelmingly passed pension cuts for city workers, other struggling cities may follow suit.

headline.seo: San Diego and San Jose Pass Pension Cuts
headline.main: San Diego and San Jose Lead Way in Pension Cuts
headline.print_headline: Leading Way, 2 Cities Pass Pension Cuts
